mapper.select: SELECT r.resource_id, r.repository_id, r.id, r.uri, rp.id AS repository_uuid FROM resource r JOIN repository rp ON rp.repository_id = r.repository_id WHERE r.uri = #{uri}

SELECT r.resource_id, r.repository_id, r.id, r.uri FROM resource r, capability c LEFT JOIN capability_attribute ca ON ca.capability_id = c.capability_id AND ca.name = 'categories' AND ca.string_value = #{category} WHERE r.resource_id = c.resource_id AND c.namespace = 'crce.identity' AND ca.capability_id IS NULL
SELECT capability_id, parent_capability_id, resource_id, level, id, namespace FROM capability WHERE resource_id = #{resourceId} ORDER BY level

SELECT capability_id, name, list_index, type, operator, string_value, long_value, double_value, boolean_value, version_major_value, version_minor_value, version_micro_value FROM capability_attribute WHERE capability_id = #{capabilityId} ORDER BY name, list_index
SELECT requirement_id, parent_requirement_id, resource_id, level, id, namespace, capability_id FROM requirement WHERE resource_id = #{resourceId} ORDER BY level

SELECT requirement_id, name, attribute_index, list_index, type, operator, string_value, long_value, double_value, boolean_value, version_major_value, version_minor_value, version_micro_value FROM requirement_attribute WHERE requirement_id = #{requirementId} ORDER BY name, attribute_index, list_index

SELECT property_id, name, list_index, type, operator, string_value, long_value, double_value, boolean_value, version_major_value, version_minor_value, version_micro_value FROM capability_property_attribute WHERE property_id = #{propertyId} ORDER BY name, list_index

SELECT property_id, name, list_index, type, operator, string_value, long_value, double_value, boolean_value, version_major_value, version_minor_value, version_micro_value FROM resource_property_attribute WHERE property_id = #{propertyId} ORDER BY name, list_index
